title: Weather Dashboard
text: This is an app that allows users to see the weather forecast for cities of their choosing.

title: Team Profile Generator
text: This is an application that generates HTML files using input from a command-line interface.

title: Work-Day Planner
text: This is a calendar application that allows user to save events hourly of the day in order to keep track of daily routine.

title: Finance
text: This is an app for analyzing the financial records of a company.

title: Password Generator
text: This is an app that is use to generate a random password based on criteria.

title: ReadMe Generator
text: It is a command-line application that dynamically generates a README file.
